info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 8:27AM EST until February 25 at 7:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Michigan... Saint Joseph River Michigan at South Bend affecting Elkhart, Berrien and St. Joseph IN Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Indiana... Elkhart River at Goshen affecting Noble and Elkhart Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... North Branch Elkhart River at Cosperville affecting Noble County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Joseph River Michigan at South Bend. * WHEN...Until Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, Flooding is confined to mostly park land and golf courses. Leeper Park and Petro golf courses begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM EST Saturday the stage was 5.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 AM EST Saturday was 5.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Tuesday afternoon to a crest of 5.6 feet early Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
